definitions.title: vb. Pi.
definitions.body: prob. weave in chequer or plaited work (NH [[שָׁבַץ]] ornament a vessel with a pattern; Syr. (lexx.) 4bas. immiscuit, 4b0s.o0 commixtio: v. also Lag:BN 143);—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. [[וְשִׁבַּחְתָּ֫]] Ex 28:39 (P), and thou shalt chequer (or plait) the tunic (in) byssus.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. mpl. [[מְשֻׁבָּחִים זׇהָב]] Ex 28:20 (P), inwoven (i.e. set in a chequered or plaited mounting) with gold (-thread) shall they be (of gems).
